column1: 1#Artificial intelligence (AI) is a branch of computer science that aims to create intelligent machines capable of performing tasks that typically require human intelligence. These tasks include understanding natural language
column4: and making decisions. AI technologies have applications in various domains

column1: 2#Machine learning is a subset of AI that focuses on developing algorithms that allow computers to learn from data and improve their performance over time without being explicitly programmed. Supervised learning
column3: and reinforcement learning are common approaches used in machine learning. Supervised learning involves training a model on labeled data
column4: unsupervised learning involves discovering patterns in unlabeled data
column5: and reinforcement learning involves learning through trial and error based on feedback from the environment.

column1: 3#Deep learning is a subfield of machine learning that uses neural networks with many layers to learn from large amounts of data. Deep learning models have achieved remarkable success in tasks such as image recognition
column4: and playing games. These models learn hierarchical representations of data
column5: enabling them to extract complex features and make accurate predictions.
